data.eml:eml: First fossil larvae of Berothidae (Neuroptera) from Baltic amber, with notes on the biology and termitophily of the family

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wedmann, Sonja, Makarkin, Vladimir N., Weiterschan, Thomas, Hörnschemeyer, Thomas (2013): First fossil larvae of Berothidae (Neuroptera) from Baltic amber, with notes on the biology and termitophily of the family. Zootaxa 3716 (2): 236-258, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3716.2.6
